__e: All I know is the folks inside this house were good people.
I guess they're just not used to Earth people, but can you imagine anyone being afraid of us?
But the knowledge of good and evil was in all the people of the Earth.
As far as the villagers are concered, that castle doesn't exist.
Mr Smith, give me everything on the inhabitants...
I have seen this city and the inhabitants.. ..of this from very near.
They're both locals... sort of came with the place. Ha!
All right, men. You are shortly to be let loose on the local inhabitants... who, you will be surprised to find, don't look at all like you.
We ought to stay here and hang out with the locals.
